Vulois

As soon as the stalagtite(Thanks Logo)hit Vulois in the head, he went 
back to his image where he's infront of the oracle, crucified. This 
time the person who was there with him was Zardus again.

"Glad to see you woke up. How was life on the outside?"

"It was horrible! I was fighting Battera and Cybershark, and I 
remembered none of this!"

"Ah, it seems that we have......"

Suddenly Zardus began to shake, and divide. But not into other 
Zardus', different people. More and more they came, until there were 
some on his left and some on his right.

He looked around and knew what he saw. On his left, was the entire 
Alliance. On his right, were the people who had an inlfuence on his 
real life. Cybershark, Soundwave, Terminess, Child, The Sky 
Schorchers, HeraldAngel, AngelNemesis, Deemos, and even Hell Beast. 
But no Battera. Than he realized it. She must be downloading the 
past! She can not exist in the dream when she really is in it. She 
must be somewhere in his mind. Suddenly, the two sides started 
fighting each other. The Alliance programming was trying to keep the 
real truth down. But this might end in a draw. The two programs could 
cancel each other out killing him, and anyone in his mind at the 
time, meaning Battera. But if Battera left, the real truth would 
collapse and the Alliance would assert intself again. He needed to 
find her, but he was chained. He could not go anywhere. He called out 
for her as the battle raged.

"BATTERA! Come quickly!"
